emuInput.TitMainTitle: Crowd of people gathered around Ruby Young playing organ next to Pepsi-Cola booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: "13. Part of the enormous crowd attracted by talented Miss Ruby Young, versatile organist, who charmed them with sweet and hot music played on a Hammond Organ."
